## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G20170](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G20170)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>MED17</u>
- **Gene Name:** MEDIATOR 17
- **Description:**   RNA polymerase II transcription mediator;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
